overview.summary: Select scalar data from a Uintah Data Archive

description.p: Select the variable to extract from the Uintah Data Archive. Level buttons refer to the resolution levels of an AMR calculation, with the lowest resolution data being level zero. If "all" is selected a multi-resolution field is created which contains all levels of resoution. (Currently only texture based visualization tools, VolumeVisualizer and VolumeSlicer, can visualize multi-resolution data)
The material button allows the user to select which material to visualize.
